ygData.subject: Re: weapons upgrade?
ygData.msgSnippet: The grobb cleaver quest is given by a troll in grobb . I don t recall his whole name but half of it is Carver.  It requires alot of travel, and for players
ygData.messageBody:
The grobb cleaver quest is given by a troll in grobb . I don't recall his
whole name but half of it is Carver. It requires alot of travel, and for
players under level 20 it will require a group.. I enlisted a level 20
cleric and level 20 druid to assist me in the "killing" portion of the
quest.

It was a fun and rewarding quest, so I won't be giving any spoilers on this
one. Everything you need to know is available from the NPCs involved.

-----Original Message-----
From: Trent Carroll <trent@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 4:33 PM
Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] weapons upgrade?
